headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' blob:; connect-src 'self' blob: https://dotnet-funcapp.azurewebsites.net https://athleticstorage2.blob.core.windows.net https://unpkg.com https://www.gstatic.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: https://www.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://www.gstatic.com;
